  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PEReHintScanner
    Scans for anomalies and malformations in a PE file.
    PEReHintScanner$  
    ReHint
    An ReHint represents a collection of anomalies that led to giving a certain advice on how to analyse the file
    ReHintScanner
    Looks for reversing hints in the given data parameter

    SimpleReHint

    SimpleReHint$  
    StandardReHint
    Several anomalies led to the ReHint
